metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20079 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
The autocmd feature in window.c in Vim before 8.1.2136 accesses freed memory.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20079` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.3
vim-athena - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.3
vim-common - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.3
vim-gnome - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.3
vim-gtk - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.3
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.3
vim-gui-common - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.3
vim-nox - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.3
vim-runtime - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.3
vim-tiny - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.3
xxd - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.3').
